entry.title: Whether it's challenging the fossil fuel industry or fighting big business, our research shifts the national policy debate for the better. It's only possible because of the support of people like you. Thanks to a matched giving program, every donation wil
entry.content: Whether it's challenging the fossil fuel industry or fighting big business, our research shifts the national policy debate for the better. It's only possible because of the support of people like you. Thanks to a matched giving program, every donation will be matched until 30 June. Just 3 days left to double your impact! Support our EOFY appeal today: http://theaus.in/eofy2023 And a special thank you to those who have already supported us. You make our work possible.

entry.title: Does Australia really deserve to host the world's biggest climate conference, after decades of greenwashing and fossil fuel expansion? Listen to the full episode of Follow the Money via the link in our bio #auspol
entry.content: Does Australia really deserve to host the world's biggest climate conference, after decades of greenwashing and fossil fuel expansion? Listen to the full episode of Follow the Money via the link in our bio #auspol

entry.title: The solutions to inflation are vastly different depending on the cause: ie if it's profits or wages. If it's profits, as the IMF, the OECD & our research have shown, then price caps & competition policy are the way to go, rather than smashing households w
entry.content: The solutions to inflation are vastly different depending on the cause: ie if it's profits or wages. If it's profits, as the IMF, the OECD & our research have shown, then price caps & competition policy are the way to go, rather than smashing households w rate rises. #auspol #ausecon #inflation

entry.title: If the RBA is so worried about wages causing inflation, we know a group of workers they could take a look at... #auspol
